name: MitziAtroposBattle
_source: s;Atropos;You... have the makings of a promising priest.|A shame you chose a foolish path.
s;Mitzi;How novel. One of the all-powerful Fates, acknowledging a mortal's choice.
s;Atropos;There is no more need for a facade, Mitzi.|You, especially, have long seen through our ruse.
s;Mitzi;Yes. Though taboo to speak publically on,|an honest study of history is not kind towards divine determinism.
s;Atropos;Truly spoken.{w} Alas, the deception will remain.
s;Mitzi;Only if you are able to strike down Lord Verstadt.
s;Atropos;Has he told you how many times he's failed already?|Hah, no matter.
